src:
Pegiat Industri Kumpul Bareng Wishnutama Bahas Ekonomi Kreatif
07 Nov 2019, 04:14 by Herdi Alif Al Hikam


Ketua Umum Kadin Indonesia Rosan Roeslani/Foto: Grandyos Zafna

Jakarta - Pengusaha yang tergabung dalam Kamar Dagang Industri (Kadin) mengadakan Rakernas Ekonomi Kreatif. Acara tahunan ini dihelat dengan tema 'Mendorong SDM Unggul Dalam Penerapan Teknologi Untuk Menjadikan Ekonomi Kreatif Sebagai Tulang Punggung Perekonomian Indonesia'. Acara dimulai sekitar pukul 10.00. Ratusan pegiat ekonomi kreatif pun telah memenuhi bangku yang disediakan. Acara ini juga dihadiri oleh Menteri Pariwisata dan Ekonomi Kreatif (Menparekraf) Wishnutama Kusubandio.Dalam sambutan pembukaannya, Ketua Umum Kadin Indonesia Rosan Roeslani mengatakan bahwa ekonomi kreatif akan menjadi tulang punggung perekonomian di Indonesia. Diprediksi kontribusinya di tahun 2019 bisa menyumbang Rp 1.211 triliun."Ini juga kita akan jadi tulang punggung perekonomian Indonesia ke depan. Kontribusi ekonomi kreatif itu diprediksi RP 1.200-an triliun tahun in kontribusinya ke PDB," ucap Rosan di Hotel Mulia, Jakarta, Kamis (7/11/2019).Dia juga memaparkan pada 2017 ekonomi kreatif menyumbang Rp 1.000 triliun, naik di tahun 2018 menjadi Rp 1.105 triliun.Lebih lanjut, dia menyatakan pertumbuhan ekonomi digital itu mencakup lima sektor, yaitu e-commerce, media daring (online), transportasi berbasis aplikasi daring, wisata dan perjalanan, serta jasa keuangan digital. Simak Video "Harapan Bekraf: RUU Ekonomi Kreatif Sah, Developer Game Berlimpah"[Gambas:Video 20detik](ara/ara)
text:
Industry Activists Gather Together Wishnutama Discuss Creative Economy
Nov 7 2019, 04:14 by Herdi Alif Al Hikam


Chairman of Kadin Indonesia Rosan Roeslani / Photo: Grandyos Zafna

Jakarta - Entrepreneurs who are members of the Chamber of Commerce and Industry (Kadin) hold a Creative Economy National Working Meeting. This annual event was held with the theme 'Encouraging Superior Human Resources in the Application of Technology to Make the Creative Economy the Backbone of the Indonesian Economy'. The event starts at around 10:00. Hundreds of creative economy activists have also filled the bench provided. The event was also attended by the Minister of Tourism and Creative Economy (Menparekraf) Wishnutama Kusubandio.In his opening remarks, Chairman of the Indonesian Chamber of Commerce and Industry Rosan Roeslani said that the creative economy would become the backbone of the economy in Indonesia. Its contribution in 2019 is predicted to contribute Rp 1,211 trillion. "This will also be the backbone of the Indonesian economy going forward. The contribution of the creative economy is predicted to be Rp 1,200 trillion a year in its contribution to GDP," Rosan said at Hotel Mulia, Jakarta, Thursday, Thursday. (7/11/2019). He also explained that in 2017 the creative economy contributed Rp 1,000 trillion, rising in 2018 to Rp 1,105 trillion. He further stated that digital economic growth covered five sectors, namely e-commerce, online media ( online), online application-based transportation, travel and travel, and digital financial services. Check out the video "Harapan Bekraf: Legitimate Creative Economy Bill, Abundant Game Developers" [Gambas: Video 20 seconds] (fig / fig)
